mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO electricityMeter
id,
voltage,
electricity,
power,
electricEnergy,
powerFactor,
co2,
frequency,
serialInterface,
addDate,
addUser,
addIp,
modifiedDate,
modifiedUser,
modifiedIp,
#{id},
#{voltage},
#{electricity},
#{power},
#{electricEnergy},
#{powerFactor},
#{co2},
#{frequency},
#{serialInterface},
#{addDate},
#{addUser},
#{addIp},
#{modifiedDate},
#{modifiedUser},
#{modifiedIp},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE electricityMeter
id = #{id},
voltage = #{voltage},
electricity = #{electricity},
power = #{power},
electricEnergy = #{electricEnergy},
powerFactor = #{powerFactor},
co2 = #{co2},
frequency = #{frequency},
serialInterface = #{serialInterface},
addDate = #{addDate},
addUser = #{addUser},
addIp = #{addIp},
modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate},
modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser},
modifiedIp = #{modifiedIp},
WHERE
AND modified = #{original}
